alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over The Acreage, or 9 miles southwest of Palm Beach Gardens, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Haverhill, Royal Palm Estates, Lake Belvedere Estates, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Loxahatchee NWR, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Florida Gardens, Century Village, Cypress Lakes and Stacey Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
